Plot: A hard-partying high school senior's philosophy on life changes when he meets the not-so-typical "nice girl."
Title: The Spectacular Now
Writer: Scott Neustadter (screenplay), Michael H. Weber (screenplay), Tim Tharp (novel)
Actors: Miles Teller, Shailene Woodley, Brie Larson, Masam Holden
tomatoConsensus: The Spectacular Now is an adroit, sensitive film that avoids typical coming-of-age story trappings.
